metadata.title: CVE-2023-0698 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds read in WebRTC in Google Chrome prior to 110.0.5481.77allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of bounds memory read via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
